properties.name: bypassDnd
properties.summary: Whether or not notifications posted to this channel can interrupt the user.

properties.name: enableLights
properties.summary: Whether notifications posted to this channel should display notification lights

properties.name: enableVibration
properties.summary: Whether notification posted to this channel should vibrate.

properties.name: id
properties.summary: The channel id specified for the notification channel.

properties.name: importance
properties.summary: The audio stream type to use when playing the sound.

properties.name: lightColor
properties.summary: The notification light color for notifications posted to this channel.

properties.name: lockscreenVisibility
properties.summary: Whether or not notifications posted to this channel are shown on the lockscreen in full or redacted form.

properties.name: name
properties.summary: The visible name of this channel. The recommended maximum length is 40 characters; the value may be truncated if it is too long.

properties.name: showBadge
properties.summary: Whether notifications posted to this channel can appear as application icon badges in a Launcher.

properties.name: sound
properties.summary: A URL to the sound to play.
properties.description:
The URL cannot refer to a file in the Resources directory, but it can refer to a file in the raw resources directory (resRawDirectory).

To create a raw resource, place the audio file in the platform/android/res/raw folder and reference it as:

notificationChannel.sound = Ti.Filesystem.resRawDirectory + 'my_sound.wav';

properties.name: vibratePattern
properties.summary: The vibration pattern for notifications posted to this channel.
properties.description: Specify the pattern in milliseconds as an array. (e.g [100, 100, 100, 400, 400, 100, 100, 100])
